value.title: Secure administrator accounts in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

value.title: Maintain a secure repository by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn best practices for building, hosting, and maintaining a secure repository on GitHub.

images.title: Maintain a secure repository by using GitHub best practices

value.title: Manage an InnerSource program by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to manage a successful InnerSource program on GitHub through effective discoverability, guidance, and maintenance.

images.title: Manage an InnerSource program by using GitHub

value.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to move your existing project to GitHub from a legacy version control system.

images.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices

value.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Webhooks offer a lightweight mechanism for your app to be notified by another service when something of interest happens. In this module. you'll learn how to trigger an Azure function with a GitHub webhook and parse the payload for insights.

images.title: Monitor GitHub events by using a webhook with Azure Functions

value.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Learn how to run containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI).

images.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore non-relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying non-relational databases, and non-relational data stores with Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure Table Storage, Azure Blob Storage, Azure File Storage, and Azure Cosmos DB, and explore situations for using them.

images.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Lake , Azure Blob Storage, and Azure File Storage.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to upload and retrieve data held in Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Blob storage, and Azure File storage.

images.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input.

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement text moderation with the Azure Content Moderator service.

images.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to adding conversational intelligence to your apps by using language understanding (LUIS)

images.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesizing text input to speech, performing speech translation, and implementing speaker recognition in your AI infused applications.

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech-to-text from the speech service,  known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

images.title: Transcribe speech input to text

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

images.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

images.title: Translate speech with the speech service
Transcribe speech input to text

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: AI has the capacity to empower the whole world to achieve more. From empowering technical development teams to mobilizing an entire organization to unlock the true potential of AI, enterprises need to think strategically about AI – and they need to start today.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value

value.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy a multicontainer application to Kubernetes on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

images.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Workshop

value.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
value.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month. Use this understanding to create an Azure budget to monitor and alert on your costs.

images.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

images.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Introduction to Azure SQL

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Caching and performance in Azure storage disks
value.excerpt: Moving data as fast as possible is good for business. Learn about disk performance in Azure, how caching can help optimize read and write access to storage, and how to enable caching to help optimize the performance of Azure VM disks.

images.title: Caching and performance in Azure storage disks

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement text moderation with the Azure Content Moderator service.

images.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API

value.title: Configure security policies to manage data
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

images.title: Configure security policies to manage data

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: A good Azure IP addressing schema provides flexibility, room for growth, and integration with on-premises networks. The schema ensures that communication works for deployed resources, minimizes public exposure of systems, and gives the organization flexibility in its network. If not properly designed, systems might not be able to communicate, and additional work will be required to remediate.

images.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment

value.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Create test and deploy Azure Functions using Visual studio and how to manage Azure Function code.

images.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio

value.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data
value.excerpt: Learn about non-relational databases, and how they compare to relational databases. Understand the different types of non-relational databases commonly used by applications.

images.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data

value.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

images.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure

value.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to upload and retrieve data held in Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Blob storage, and Azure File storage.

images.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Lake , Azure Blob Storage, and Azure File Storage.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

value.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export
value.excerpt: Evaluate Azure Import/Export to copy data from Azure Blob storage to an on-premises server. Create an export job in your Azure Storage account. Get the BitLocker keys to unlock the drives that you receive.

images.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export

value.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage
value.excerpt: In this module, you learn how to make your application storage highly available by ensuring that you can fail over resources if there's an Azure region failure.

images.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage

value.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
value.excerpt: Design a network architecture in Azure that allows for growth and flexibility, secure isolation of critical resources, low administrative overhead, and communication with on-premises network resources.

images.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
